abstract: The purchase by the private equity unit of Neuberger Berman is a sign that activist investors are gaining broader acceptance.
snippet: The purchase by the private equity unit of Neuberger Berman is a sign that activist investors are gaining broader acceptance.
lead_paragraph: The private equity unit of Neuberger Berman Group has bought a stake in the activist hedge fund Jana Partners, underscoring the growing popularity of investors who rattle the boards of corporate America.

headline.main: Investment Firm Buys Stake in Activist Hedge Fund Jana Partners
